channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- PCManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- PCManager

item.title: CVE-2021-3451|2024-08-03T16:53:17.757Z -- lenovo -- pcmanager
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PCManager, prior to version 3.0.400.3252, that could allow configuration files to be written to non-standard locations.

item.title: CVE-2021-3722|2024-08-03T17:01:07.870Z -- lenovo -- pcmanager
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PCManager prior to version 4.0.40.2175 that could allow configuration files to be written to non-standard locations during installation.

item.title: CVE-2021-3721|2024-08-03T17:01:08.308Z -- lenovo -- pcmanager
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PCManager prior to version 4.0.20.10282 that could allow an attacker with local access to trigger a blue screen error.

item.title: CVE-2021-3464|2024-08-03T16:53:17.612Z -- lenovo -- pcmanager
item.description: A DLL search path vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PCManager, prior to version 3.0.400.3252, that could allow privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2021-3550|2024-08-03T17:01:07.162Z -- lenovo -- pcmanager
item.description: A DLL search path vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PCManager, prior to version 3.0.500.5102, that could allow privilege escalation.
